page.title: 05 Sample Survey Con't
page.content:
4)Do you have any paper or magazine preference.Are they delivered daily, weekly, or weekends only. 5)How many cars do you have in your household? 6)Do you follow a religion? 7)What type of entertainment do you prefer? Do you have to travel or is it found locally? 8)Do you have services such as gas, electricity and telephone? 9)Where do you take your holidays and when.
Q.3 OCCUPATION __________
1)What is your present occupation? 2)If involved in farming, what type are you involved in?
